ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine looked toward Ramulus and Shadow Wing  You two ready? he glanced around the rock he was behind, Can you fly Wing? He looked over at Ramulus Focus

Lunarpine looked toward Ramulus and Shadow Wing " You two ready? he 
glanced around the rock he was behind, "Can you fly Wing?"

He looked over at Ramulus "Focus your fire at the one closest to 
Ramhorn." he knew thatif the bad bots accepted Spears suggestion that 
they'd have two hostages. He couldn't let that happen.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Spears::
> 
> Still holding the spear in front of Unitron's face.
> "Now release the hostage.  If a hostage is all your looking for, 
take 
> me.  At least I can take anything you can dish out." She looked at 
> Ram. "He looks like he's about to join the Matrix.  Let him go and 
> take a bot that can take the punishment. Or, you can kill him and I 
> put this spear through yor head. It's all up to you Unitron. Take 
it 
> or leave it."
